#labels svn,eclipse
 

#Committing your project through Eclipse doesn't require you to use tortoisesvn or terminal which is very convenient and quick*

*Steps
# On the Project Explorer, right click your project folder
# Select Team -> Share Project
# Select SVN than click Next
# Select Use existing repository location 
# Click https://talking-points-3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk 
# Finish 

Than, you will see an empty folder on the Source page in talking-points-3. 
You need to do the following steps to complete commit steps. 

# On the Project Explorer, right click your project folder
# Select Team -> Commit 
# Write message for Commit 
# Finish
